name: EventRiding
description: This event is fired when the player starts or stops riding an entity.
overview:
Backed by class `EventRiding`. This event is fired when the player starts or stops riding any entity. It is not cancellable and is useful for travel tracking and vehicle management.

### Fields
- **state** (boolean): True if starting to ride, false if stopping.
- **entity** (EntityHelper | null): The entity being ridden. Can be null when stopping riding or in edge cases.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
